skills.name: CRUCIFY
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• 20% Chance for each ally to gain Endure, Immunity, or Invincibility for 1 turn.
• Damage dealt increases based on the enemy’s ATK and MAGIC.

skills.name: GOLDEN STARE
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• Grants Heal Shield to all allies.
• Heal Shield heals for a percentage of the damage received.

skills.name: ENERGIZE
desc: Gain 2 extra points of Power every round.
